data.name: AccountCreationErrorGmailFooter
data.value: In case the error persists, please read the {0}FAQ section{1} to learn more about the problem.

data.name: AttachmentsDocumentNotFoundError
data.value: Document not found or not exists on storage.

data.name: AttachmentsLimitLabel
data.value: Note: The file size must not exceed %1 MB. The total size of all files should be no more than %2 MB.

data.name: AttachmentsTotalLimitError
data.value: Total size of all attachments exceeds limit.

data.name: AttachmentsUnknownError
data.value: Some error has happend. Try again later.

data.name: AuthErrorPopupBodyHeader
data.value: An error occurred while connecting to the account.

data.name: AuthErrorPopupBody
data.value: There are problems with send and receive operations for the {0} mail account.{1} The reason might be that you changed your account password. Please, check all the account settings you entered or sign in to the mail service you use and check the security settings.

data.name: AuthErrorPopupBodyFooter
data.value: In case the error persists, please read the {2}FAQ section{3} to learn more about the problem or contact your portal administrator.

data.name: AuthErrorDisablePopupBodyHeader
data.value: The mail account has been disabled due to connection error.

data.name: AuthErrorDisablePopupBody
data.value: The {0} mail account could not be connected for a long time and had to be disabled.{1} Please, check all the account settings you entered or sign in to the mail service you use and check the security settings. When you are sure all the issues with the account connection are resolved you can always enable it in your connected accounts list.

data.name: CorrectAccountRecommendation
data.value: Please, check your account settings. If you are sure your settings are correct, sign in to your mail provider to confirm any verification questions and then try again.

data.name: EmptyDraftsDescription
data.value: The Draft section allows you to create and sort messages which you can send to different people later. Here you can tick the most important messages or delete the unnecessary ones.

data.name: EmptyDraftsHeader
data.value: No messages to be displayed in this folder

data.name: EmptyInboxDescription
data.value: The Inbox section allows you to manage the messages you receive. Here you can see the correspondence history, tick the most important messages, group emails by categories using tags or delete the unnecessary ones.

data.name: EmptyScrAccountsDescription
data.value: Set up an account to send, receive and keep your messages in order right on the portal. Get access to message history, contacts and files through any browser anytime, anywhere. Sort messages using your own tags. Create mailbox for the ready-made free default domain.

data.name: EmptyScrAccountsHeader
data.value: No account is set up yet

data.name: EmptyScrCrmDescription
data.value: This contact list will contain all your clients from CRM

data.name: EmptyScrTagsDescription
data.value: First create tag - then use them

data.name: EmptySentDescription
data.value: The Sent section allows you to manage the messages you send. Here you can tick the most important messages, group emails by categories using tags or delete the unnecessary ones.

data.name: EmptySpamDescription
data.value: The Spam section contains messages you identified as junk mail. Here you can delete emails, classify them as 'non-spam' or clear the whole section.

data.name: EmptySpamHeader
data.value: No messages to be displayed in this folder

data.name: EmptyTrashDescription
data.value: The Trash section contains messages which were deleted. Here you can recover some emails or definitely delete them.

data.name: EmptyTrashHeader
data.value: No messages to be displayed in this folder

data.name: ErrorAccountAlreadyExists
data.value: This account already exists in TeamLab Mail.

data.name: ErrorNotificationEx
data.value: An error has happened during account creation! Please, check your network connection, or ask for help your network or portal administrator!

data.name: ImportAccountText
data.value: Message importing is in progress. It can take some time. You can close this window and continue using the Mail or even close the browser. The importing will continue in background.

data.name: ImportGmailAttention
data.value: Some of the messages which have been received using other services earlier might be not imported. Please read the {0}FAQ section{1} for more details.

data.name: ImportProblemText
data.value: If an error occurs while importing the mail, please read the {0}FAQ section{1} for more details.

data.name: MessageNotSent
data.value: The message has not been sent. Are you sure you want to delete it?

data.name: NoLettersFilterDescription
data.value: No letters matching your filter can be displayed in this folder. Please select other filter options or clear filter to view all the contacts in this folder.

data.name: NoLettersFilterHeader
data.value: No letters to be displayed for this filter here

data.name: QuotaPopupBody
data.value: The available disk storage space is exceeded on your portal. Not all messages can be loaded and no new messages can be sent. Please delete some messages from the Inbox or delete some files from the Documents module. You can also change the pricing plan to have more available disk space.

data.name: QuotaPopupHeader
data.value: The available disk storage is exceeded

data.name: RemoveSpamQuestion
data.value: Do you want to remove all letters from Spam?

data.name: RemoveTrashQuestion
data.value: Do you want to remove all letters from Trash?

data.name: ResetCrmContactsFilterDescription
data.value: No CRM contacts matching your filter can be displayed on this page. Please select other filter options or clear filter to view all the CRM contacts.

data.name: ResetCrmContactsFilterHeader
data.value: No CRM contacts to be displayed for this filter here

data.name: ResetTlContactsFilterDescription
data.value: No TeamLab contacts matching your filter can be displayed on this page. Please select other filter options or clear filter to view all the TeamLab contacts.

data.name: ResetTlContactsFilterHeader
data.value: No TeamLab contacts to be displayed for this filter here

data.name: SendFromDeactivateAccount
data.value: This account has been deactivated. Please, activate this account or select another one.

data.name: TagNotificationText
data.value: Imported from CRM. You cannot edit or delete this tag here.

data.name: DeliveryFailurePopupBody
data.value: Please, check your message recipients addresses and message format. If you are sure your message is correct, check all the {account_name} account settings, and, if everything is correct, sign in to the mail service you use and confirm any verification questions, in case there are some. After then try again.

data.name: DeliveryFailurePopupBodyFooter
data.value: In case the error persists, please read the {faq_link_open_tag}FAQ section{faq_link_close_tag} to learn more about the problem.

data.name: ImportAccountRestrictLabel
data.value: All the mail for the last 30 days will be imported.

data.name: DeleteTagShure
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this tag %1?

data.name: AccountNotificationText
data.value: The account is connected using OAuth, editing is limited.

data.name: ExistAccountText
data.value: If you want to reconnect this account, please remove it first from the list of your connected accounts at the 'Settings > Accounts Management' page.

data.name: AddAccountInfoQuestion
data.value: Do you want to add your first mail account right now?

data.name: AddAccountInfoText
data.value: You haven't got any mail accounts connected to TeamLab Mail. Please add your mail account to start receiving and sending email messages.

data.name: AddAccountInfoTitle
data.value: Add a new account to start using TeamLab Mail.

data.name: ExportMessageText
data.value: Export message to CRM contact history complete successfully

data.name: LinkConversationText
data.value: Link conversation to CRM contact history complete successfully

data.name: ExportFailurePopupName
data.value: An error occurred while exporting the message.

data.name: ExportFailurePopupText
data.value: The message you are trying to export is already linked with the selected CRM item.

data.name: LinkFailurePopupName
data.value: An error occurred while linking the conversation to CRM.

data.name: LinkFailurePopupText
data.value: The selected CRM item is no longer available, or the connection has been lost. Please, verify the selected CRM item location and check your network connection. In case the error persists, please contact your portal administrator.

data.name: AttachmentsExecutableWarning
data.value: executable files may not be allowed by some services (f.e. Gmail)

data.name: ErrorOpenMessage
data.value: A problem has occurred while trying to open this message.

data.name: ErrorOpenMessageHelp
data.value: Please refresh the page and try to open this message once again. In case the problem persists, please {0}contact our support team.{1}

data.name: ErrorParseMessageHelp
data.value: Our apologies for the inconveniences but the mail message failed to load to Teamlab Mail. Use the copy of the original message added as an attachment to open it using any available mail client software or {0}contact our support team.{1}

data.name: TeamlabAccountNotificationText
data.value: This is TeamLab account. You can't edit or delete this account.

data.name: SignatureInformationText
data.value: This signature will be added at the end of all letters from this account. You can write there your name, contacts or slogan.

data.name: SaveAllAttachmentsToMyDocsSuccess
data.value: It was successfully saved %real_count% from %count% in My Documents.

data.name: SaveAttachmentToMyDocsSuccess
data.value: '%file_name%' is successfully saved in My Documents.

data.name: SetAccountEMailInFolderSuccess
data.value: Setup of EMail-In folder was successful.

data.name: SetAccountEMailInFolderFailure
data.value: Setup of EMail-In folder was unsuccessful.

data.name: ResetAccountEMailInFolderSuccess
data.value: Reset of EMail-In folder was successful.

data.name: ResetAccountEMailInFolderFailure
data.value: Reset of EMail-In folder was unsuccessful.

data.name: EmailInFailurePopupBodyHeader
data.value: Uploading attachment to selected folder failed.

data.name: EmailInFolderAccessRightsFailurePopupText
data.value: The selected Attachments folder could not be accessed and was unlinked from your {account} mail account. Please check whether you have enough access rights for the selected folder and relink it back.

data.name: EmailInFolderNotFoundFailurePopupText
data.value: The selected Attachments folder could not be found and was unlinked from your {account} mail account. Please check whether the selected folder exists and relink it back.

data.name: DisableAllMailboxesPopupText
data.value: Your portal has not been used for quite a long time, so your mail accounts connected to Teamlab Mail have been disabled. If you still want to use them go to your account page and enable them back again.

data.name: ErrorSendMessage
data.value: A problem has occurred while trying to send this message.

data.name: ServerMailboxNotificationText
data.value: Server mailbox, edited in administration panel only

data.name: MessageImagesBlockedPopupBody
data.value: This message contains images that cannot be displayed at the moment. Do you want to print it?

data.name: ConversationImagesBlockedPopupBody
data.value: This conversation contains images that cannot be displayed at the moment. Do you want to print it?

data.name: AliasNotificationText
data.value: Alias of mailbox %mailbox_address%, edited in administration panel only

data.name: DefaultAccountText
data.value: This account used to send the mail by default

data.name: SetAsDefaultAccountText
data.value: Set as default and use to send the mail

data.name: GroupCouldNotSetAsDefault
data.value: Group cannot be set as default mailbox

data.name: CreateMyMailboxPopupBody_1
data.value: We provide you with a ready-made free default domain so that you could create your new mailbox right away.

data.name: CreateMyMailboxPopupBody_2
data.value: This domain is common for all portals, so it is recommended that your corporate domain was used for corporate email correspondence.

data.name: ConversationCollapsedBlockedPopupBody
data.value: This conversation contains collapsed messages which may include hidden images. Do you want to print it?
